Detailed Description

Classes and operations related to formatting.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum chaos::io::format::ANSIColour

Enumerator representing the possible unique ANSI escape sequence colours.

ANSI colours are mutually exclusive, therefore custom background and foreground colours can not be mixed.

enum chaos::io::format::ANSIAttribute

Enumerator representing the possible unique ANSI escape sequence attributes.

These attributes are mutually exclusive, therefore cannot be combined.

Enumerator
ANSI_ATTR_NONE 

No attribute is applied to the text.

ANSI_ATTR_BOLD 

The text is made bolder than normal.

ANSI_ATTR_UNDERSCORE 

Each character in the text is overlaid with an underscore.

ANSI_ATTR_BLINK 

The text is blinking.

ANSI_ATTR_REVERSE 

The colours of the text are reversed, with the background applied to the foreground and vice versa.

Function Documentation

void chaos::io::format::apply_escape_sequence ( chaos::uni::UTF8String &  text,
ANSIColour  colour,
ANSIAttribute  attribute = ANSI_ATTR_NONE 
)

Applies an ANSI escape sequence to the provided text.

Parameters
textThe string text to be wrapped with the escape sequence.
colourthe colour to use on the text.
attributethe attribute to use on the text.
void chaos::io::format::centre_text ( chaos::uni::UTF8String &  text,
const chaos::uint32  line_length,
bool  trim_trailing = false 
)

Centres the given text with whitespace on either side so that has a symbol length equal to line_length.

If the symbol length of the text is greater than line_length then the text will be left unmodified.

Parameters
textThe text to be centered.
line_lengthThe desired number of symbols in the line after this operation has taken place.
trim_trailingwhether trailing whitespace should be not be added.
